 Slide 1 of 3

banner works!

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbCarouselModule } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { NgIf } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-banner', standalone: true, templateUrl: './banner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./banner.component.css'] }) export class BannerComponent { images = [944, 1011, 984].map((n) => `https://picsum.photos/id/${n}/900/500`); // images = [ // {img:'assets/carousel/c01.jpg', // }, // { // img:'assets/carousel/c02', // }, // { // img:'assets/carousel/03.jpg', // } // ] }
